Description: Unit 42 identified malicious files linked to ShinySp1d3r ransomware, tracked as Bling Libra. This ransomware is actively developed, potentially featuring a Linux version. Bling Libra uses data theft and extortion, reportedly associated with Scattered Lapsus' Hunters.
